name: E-commerce Store
description: Full-featured online store with product catalog, cart, checkout, and payment processing

phases.label: Project Setup
phases.description: Initialize project structure, database, and authentication

tasks.label: Initialize Next.js project
tasks.prompt: Create a new Next.js 14 project with TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, ESLint, and the App Router. Set up the directory structure with src/app, src/components, src/lib, and src/types.

tasks.label: Configure PostgreSQL with Prisma
tasks.prompt: Set up Prisma ORM with PostgreSQL. Create the initial schema with User, Product, Category, CartItem, and Order models. Include proper relations, indexes, and timestamps.

tasks.label: Set up authentication
tasks.prompt: Configure Auth.js (NextAuth) with email/password and Google OAuth. Set up session handling, middleware for protected routes, and user registration flow.

tasks.label: Product catalog and search
tasks.prompt: Build the product catalog: listing page with grid/list view, product detail page, category filtering, and search functionality. Use server components for SEO.

tasks.label: Shopping cart
tasks.prompt: Implement shopping cart: add/remove items, quantity updates, persistent cart (localStorage + database sync for logged-in users), cart summary component.

tasks.label: Stripe payment integration
tasks.prompt: Integrate Stripe: create checkout sessions, handle webhooks for payment confirmation, store payment records, implement refund support.

tasks.label: Product listing UI components
tasks.prompt: Create reusable UI components: ProductCard, ProductGrid, CategoryNav, SearchBar, PriceFilter, SortDropdown. Use Tailwind CSS with responsive design.

phases.label: Polish & Quality
phases.description: Checkout flow, tests, and responsive design

tasks.label: Checkout flow
tasks.prompt: Build the complete checkout flow: address form, shipping options, order summary, Stripe payment element, order confirmation page, email notification.

tasks.label: Generate test suite
tasks.prompt: Generate comprehensive tests: unit tests for cart logic and price calculations, API route tests for products and orders, component tests for ProductCard and CartSummary.

tasks.label: Responsive design polish
tasks.prompt: Ensure all pages are fully responsive: mobile navigation, touch-friendly cart, responsive product grid, tablet-optimized checkout form.
